Name: [Ally] Avocaboo
Desc:
All squad members take <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> less DMG.
Active Skill: Shoots juice bullets at the character currently on the battlefield. If the bullet misses, the juice will remain on the ground for a while. Characters coming into contact with the juice will recover HP. The recovery effect can only trigger up to 15 times per combat.
Desc2: Small but functional, it's a great help to Proxies in the Hollows.
